name: Send offline conversions when lead converts to deal in Pipedrive
description:
This template is part of the [How to automate & maximize lead generation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-9oX7XEISLs&ab_channel=Make) webinar. 

Improve Pipedrive lead tracking by sending offline conversions to Google Ads, Facebook, and LinkedIn when leads convert to deals for enhanced performance insights.
